name: Steel Curtain Protocol
desc: $Market operates under a doctrine of strict isolationism and territorial defence. Heavily fortified border installations, stringent customs protocols, and restricted movement create a near-impenetrable security cordon prioritising self-sufficiency over trade. Foreign merchants find the bureaucratic barriers prohibitive, and commercial integration suffers.

name: Steel Curtain Protocol
desc: $market operates under the Steel Curtain Protocol, also known as the Draconis Readiness Condition (DRACON), a system-wide threat posture calibrated to current strategic pressures. Higher readiness levels bring increased military presence and defensive hardening at the cost of economic disruption and civil stability.
